memberships.name: NP Membership
memberships.description: Designed for non-profit organizations. This membership level is free of charge, providing basic access to resources and support for charitable entities.

memberships.name: Bronze Membership
memberships.description: Offers essential benefits and services for a low fee. Ideal for individuals or small businesses looking for basic access to resources and networking opportunities.

memberships.name: Silver Membership
memberships.description: Provides additional perks and enhanced services compared to the Bronze level. This mid-tier membership is suitable for those seeking more comprehensive support and increased engagement with the community.

memberships.name: Gold Membership
memberships.description: The premium membership level, offering the most extensive benefits and exclusive services. This level is perfect for those who want maximum access to resources, premium support, and top-tier networking opportunities.
